originalText.text: Hi! I had a Hair ritual by Sisley treatment with Denis the other day! Girls, I highly recommend both the procedure and Denis. My hair became saturated and silky. And the touch of Denis' hands gave me goosebumps all the time! Thank you for such a cool procedure and golden hands of the master!

originalText.text:
FIVE STARS!!!
In 2010 I stopped going to hair salons. I even started cutting my own hair despite having no idea what I was doing because I had issues trusting other people with my hair.

I had a conversation with Denys about my hair insecurities, and he made me feel so comfortable, that I decided to trust him and get my hair done with him. And boy, am I glad I took that leap of faith!!! If you say you donâ€™t want a lot of hair cut off, he will actually honor that (unlike so many other hairstylists). Heâ€™s given me beautiful even layers, a stunning balayage. And the first time I saw him, I forgot to tell him I had recently used red temporary hair dye, and he was able to use his wizardry to color correct that out of my hair. I was so impressed. He really knows what heâ€™s doing with colors and color correction.

I won an award for best makeup and hairstyling at a New Years event, which I couldnâ€™t have won without Denys.

If you have issues trusting people with your hair, Denys is your guy!

originalText.text: My wife knows Denis for 20 years, he was her hair designer for the high school graduation prom. Last time when we were in NYC, Denis matched her special treatment for the hair and her curlies are now back after 10 years! He is talented hair designer, passioned about his job, and loves make hair look beautiful!

originalText.text:
I don't know about you, but inÂ theÂ past it was quite often when, after visitingÂ aÂ hairÂ salon, spending time and money I came home, washed myÂ hairÂ - and alas, I saw how Princess had turned back to Cinderella! Ouch!

It wasÂ theÂ will of merciful God that I met Denys one day - and it was it. I only trust him with myÂ hairÂ ever since.

Denys isÂ aÂ talentedÂ hairÂ stylistÂ hands down! His technical skills are incredible, his taste and aesthetic vision are amazing, and his passion for his profession is impressive! He thoroughly enjoys his job and he makes his clients feel loved and valued.

Denys is not onlyÂ aÂ skillful master in haircut and colorist, he hasÂ aÂ great eye for what looks good on you - he isÂ aÂ true artist who creates your image!

I am frequently complimented on my hairs - isn't itÂ theÂ best evidence of Denys's magic skills?

AsÂ aÂ knowledgeable educator, Denys recommends products and ways to properly take care of yourÂ hair, he may advise you on your make up, he takes time to make you look perfect, he always wants that you look stylish and soigne!

I love everything he does and I always walk out feeling happy and more confident.

Thank you, Denys, so much for your amazing job!
